datoCmsKey.name: Barrie Kreinik
datoCmsKey.bio: Barrie Kreinik is a multidisciplinary performing artist based in New York City. She has performed in plays and musicals Off-Broadway and regionally, and has sung at music venues from 54 Below to Birdland to The Bitter End. Her debut original music EP, Unlearning, was released in 2019. As a playwright, she creates multifaceted roles for women of all ages, with a focus on queer women in history. She is also an award-winning audiobook narrator.
